transportAdvice: Old San Juan and the Condado beach strip are walkable for tourists, but a car or taxi is recommended for reaching areas beyond the historic center. Public buses serve the metro area but are infrequent and not well-suited for tourist itineraries; taxis and ride-hailing are widely available and practical for most trips.

weather.description: Dry and pleasant with warm days and comfortable evenings, making it one of the best months to visit.
Continued dry conditions with plenty of sunshine and mild breezes off the Atlantic.
Warm and mostly dry with increasing sunshine as the season transitions toward spring.
Temperatures rise and occasional afternoon showers begin to appear, though rain is generally brief.
Humidity climbs noticeably and short tropical showers become more frequent, especially in the afternoon.
Early hurricane season brings hot, humid weather with regular rain showers and occasional heavy downpours.
Hot and humid with frequent afternoon thunderstorms; peak hurricane season awareness begins.
The hottest and most humid month, with the highest statistical risk of tropical storm activity.
Peak of hurricane season with heavy rainfall possible; travelers should monitor weather forecasts closely.
Still within hurricane season with frequent rain, though storm risk begins to taper toward month's end.
Conditions begin to improve as the rainy season winds down and temperatures become more comfortable.
Dry and warm with festive holiday atmosphere; one of the most popular months for visitors.
